citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility environmental enhancement plan(EEP) to promote the psychological well-being of its nonhuman primates has
not been revised since January 26th, 2024 despite two changes in staffing at the Attending Veterinarian(AV) position
since that time. According to the facility document, evaluations are to occur at least once a year, with additional reviews
being conducted whenever there is an AV staffing change. An EEP that is not approved by the current AV could
potentially lead to unnecessary discomfort, trauma, behavioral stress, or physical harm to the animals housed within the
facility. The EEP must be in accordance with the currently accepted professional standards as cited in appropriate
professional journals or reference guides, and as directed by the AV.
Correct by 8/20/25
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian.
Additional Inspectors:
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.81 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility environmental enhancement plan(EEP) to promote the psychological well-being of its nonhuman primates has 
not been revised since January 26th, 2024 despite two changes in staffing at the Attending Veterinarian(AV) position 
since that time. According to the facility document, evaluations are to occur at least once a year, with additional reviews 
being conducted whenever there is an AV staffing change. An EEP that is not approved by the current AV could 
potentially lead to unnecessary discomfort, trauma, behavioral stress, or physical harm to the animals housed within the 
facility. The EEP must be in accordance with the currently accepted professional standards as cited in appropriate 
professional journals or reference guides, and as directed by the AV. 
Correct by 8/20/25 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
